00040     @Action
00041     public void showAboutBox() {
00042         if (aboutBox == null) {
00043             JFrame mainFrame = ScheatorApp.getApplication().getMainFrame();
00044             aboutBox = new ScheatorAboutBox(mainFrame);
00045             aboutBox.setLocationRelativeTo(mainFrame);
00046         }
00047         ScheatorApp.getApplication().show(aboutBox);
00048     }
